author: n3tsurge
description: This capability involves maintaining a risk register that documents identified risks, their potential impact, and the mitigation strategies in place. The risk register is a crucial tool for managing security risks within an organization, allowing teams to prioritize and address vulnerabilities effectively. It serves as a living document that is regularly updated to reflect the current risk landscape.

requirements.description: Operational procedures and standards for consistent execution.
Monitoring and metrics capabilities to track operational effectiveness.

title: Maintain a Risk Register

references.name: NIST SP 800-61 Rev. 2: Computer Security Incident Handling Guide
